p: The pClVP1 97L167E and pClVP1 97R167E infectious clones were ordered from Biomatik (Ontario, Canada) as previously described [ 39]. The VP1 E167G mutation was added by site directed mutagenesis as previously described [ 59] using 5’GCCAGATTCCAGAGGGTCTCTCGCATGGC3’ forward and 5’GCCATGCGAGAGACCCTCTGGAATCTGGC3’ reverse primers. Constructs were checked by sequencing, linearized with BamHI, in vitro transcribed and transfected into Vero or Caco-2 cells, as previously described [ 39].
